column3: â€œPurple Wreck is one of my all-time favorite hybrids. It's a cross between Purple Urkle X Trainwreck, a little bit will keep you going but a lot will incapacitate you. This is a very strong strain that can be excellent for day or night use. With almost instant effects behind the eyes and in the temples, Purple Wreck works beautifully for relieving headaches as well as sinus and ocular pressure, but it is not for the f...â€

â€œğŸµ..The name says It All, Exactly like I feel today, A purple WRECK!..ğŸ’”
 

sooo I smoked a Fatty of this lovely Arizona Lady, now I'm Totally Wrecked in a Verrry Good way!!..still crying Purple Tears for my sweet BelovedğŸ’œPRINCE.. Purple Rain
column5: this PAIN become like the Rain on my bedroom Door?..when will it hurt no More?.."When Doves Cry" Oh
column6: Why??..The High is Really coming on

column3: â€œThe phenotype that I purchsed had no purple tinge in it but this is by far the best product I have smoked. Has a sweet smell with an underlying odor of diesel. The PW relieved all my anxiety and lifted my spirits up and made me feel very well and happy. This strain also gave me lots of energy and my creative juices were unleashed. This medicine is, in my opinion, among the best.â€

â€œI've never smoked train wreck before, but now understand where the wreck" part comes in. I smoked half a joint of organically grown and properly cured bud. Its one of those weeds that hits you so hard that you dont even realize you're high until about 15 min into the high. It made me talkative
column4: and helped me through some slight depression.â€"

column3: â€œHad this as shatter. Smooth and delicious. Tasted like sweet grape/berries with a hint of tar. Gives it a subtle black licorice aftertaste. For like a sec or two. Not exactly like it but it's all I can think of to describe to a relatable flavor.â€

â€œI am a quad, smoked this with an mmj friend, and felt really good immediately but within a half hour or so, I was feeling extremely paranoid.  Lasted perhaps an hour and after it faded I recognized my episode of paranoia.  I don't know if it was just me, that day. I recommend this, it's powerful and tastes great, helped with muscle spasms etc. very well, and say just be aware of the possible paranoid feelings.  Have ...â€

â€œI ordered some Purple Wreck (aka Paisley No.2 in Tweed's lingo) from the LP Tweed, and I would have to say that this is probably one of their better strains.

The buds were mostly a deep purple with some green and a light dusting of trichromes. The buds were bone dry and after smoking left a decently clean gray ash. Taste was hints of blueberry on the exhale.

The effects were mild, requiring several bowls to feel a ...â€

â€œburned really bad- as in horrible dry mouth and feelin like it scorched my tongue. also burned p fast, and hits hard. but, it makes me feel happy and inspired and relaxed, which is def what i need. made me go from depressed college student who just lost a pet to a giggly weirdo distracted from the pain of itâ€

â€œPopping open a container of Purple Wreck is like opening a giant bag of skittles filled with only grape skittles, it's super sweet! Delicious grape clouds wrap you in absolute bliss, loving that the body buzz sets in almost instantly. Really uplifting and very euphoric in high doses. It's also pretty incapacitating at higher doses, Purple Wreck definitely lives up to it's name!â€

â€œone of my favorite strains of buying from Arizona Organix. THC % is usually 22%+ the lowest I have got was 21.somthing% THC.  Honestly I'm a different type smoker. I don't care about flavors, smell, looks and or anything else except how stoned do I get. I prefer a heavy heavy mind and body high. Anything that makes my brain tingle is a plus. all that being said Purple Wreck is one of my favorites. Good head high slig...â€
â€œI smoked it while chilling out in a park and it was an awesome high. I was extremely relaxed.â€

â€œI really liked this strain. It's had all the qualities that I like and require for sacred Medicines. Amazingly frosted neon green with lavender colors everywhere. Super dense buds that are almost too dense if there was such a thing. Tastes like it smells.  My wife who doesn't smoke loves it, gentle enough with one hit to uplift and provide head change while she still feels normal.â€

â€œI ordered this strain from Tweed to try because it was a good price and I was looking for another night time Indica. Quite frankly there was little else on offer at Tweed. The THC content was only 9%. The buds were quite dry and crumbly. There was a lovely sweet fragrance when the buds were ground so at least some if the terpines were intact. I will say, this is the purplest, darkest marijuana I have ever seen. The l...â€

â€œHeavy hitting indica. Maybe not the best choice for morning use. Like most purples flavor was very enjoyable first few hits turning into pure asss at the end. A strong high I can feel in my temples and chest.â€
â€œGives me the giggles like crazy. I will literally be laughing through tears smh. Crazy. But I sleep amazingly and feel well rested the next day. Gives me the munchies tambien.â€

â€œOmg another one of my favorites... MMMM  tastes  just like the name says .. U can taste the urkle .. This silly sucker always  makes me laugh and do some stupid SHYT .I WOULD NEVER DO  BUT I ENJOYED THAT HIGH ..  IT HAD ME DISCOMBOBULATEDâ€

â€œPurple wreck is yummy,
Got some beautiful flowers couple weeks ago. Amazingly frosted green and purple color. Amazing smell super dense buds. So tasty you want to smoke more than u need. 
If you over indulge can make u sleepy. My wife who doesn't smoke loved it for stress relaxation, and that it wasn't too over powering if u take one puff.â€

â€œI ordered this strain from Tweed to try because it was a good price and I was looking for another night time Indica. Quite frankly there was little else on offer at Tweed. The THC content was only 9%. The buds were quite dry and crumbly. There was a lovely sweet fragrance when the buds were ground so at least some if the terpines were intact. I will say, this is the purplest, darkest marijuana I have ever seen. The l...â€

â€œThe smell threw me off initially, but wow, am I glad that I decided to try it! Very complex taste similar to many Purple Indica dominant strains that I've tasted. The taste is way better than the smell, which is reminiscent of the original skunk strains but with notes of sour grape and hash. You feel each and every hit that you take of this stuff and for many, this will be a, One hitter quitter." I would recommend t...â€"

â€œThis strain landed me on my ass. Was a very nice body high along with a stimulated creativity and deep euphoria. Not something you should be smoking if you have a working day ahead of you probably but an amazing strain for relaxation.â€
â€œlove the smell and taste of this strain. This will definitely cheer you up if your having a bad day.â€

â€œThis is my new favorite strain! I am drawn to dark buds and Arizona Organix has some of the best indica in the West Valley! With PurpleWreck you not only get nice easily seen purple leafs throughout the buds contrasted with bright orange hairs. This flower is aesthetically pleasing to the eye and just looking at it makes me happy! You can smell hints of grape & sweetness rolled along with the more pungent & earthy sm...â€

â€œThis is one of the few strains that will consistently put me to sleep every time i smoke it. After 3 or 4 bowls of Purple Wreck all my mind and body will be thinking is SLEEP. If you don't smoke as much (like a bowl) it is very calming. Helps with Muscle pain and relaxes you with a nice body high. Overall I give this wondrous strain a 4.2/5. Good for Insomnia, Pain Relief, Muscle Spasms, Stress, and Appetite Stimulat...â€

â€œPurple Wreck is pretty damn good.  It definitely relaxed my body,  but it took me several vapes before I really started to feel it.  It tastes really nice and sweet.  Be careful for those looking for something that will make you energetic or creative because for me this was quite the opposite.  I enjoyed it!â€

â€œThis strain landed me on my ass. Was a very nice body high along with a stimulated creativity and deep euphoria. Not something you should be smoking if you have a working day ahead of you probably but an amazing strain for relaxation.â€

â€œFor me it helped with the hyper part of ADHD, but not so much with the spacey, ADD Part :) But that's OK because it's bedtime. Time to relax, turn my brain off, and let the pain relief sink in! Thatâ€™s exactly what Purple wreck does for me. I definitely feel and smell the purple in Purple Wreck, and I have chronic pain and usually don't get a whole lot of pain relief, but this really did help!â€
â€œThe purple makes up for the 'meh'-tastic Trainwreck.  Super tasty.  Love this strain.  Hard to grow and bring out it's true flavor, but when done well it's undeniably fantastic.â€

â€œGreat strain to smoke if u feel like giving up on the world. Makes you smile, makes you appreciate the littlest things in life and that you have the opportunity to experience this wonderful strain. This strain is sure to put a smile on your face or at least make you worries seem insignificant. I recommend.â€

â€œThis is an excellent strain, with a very fruity, grape smell and taste to it, and the effects are just great! One toke and I felt no pain, stress, anxiety, boredom, or any negative feelings! i would highly reccomend it.â€

River Rock's selection is so great that many other strains are worth trying.  If you haven't tr...â€
